subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Once a top-10 player and the highest-ranked American man, Mardy Fish, 33, is back for a last go — if for nothing else than to “reaffirm that I can still play the game.”
snippet: Once a top-10 player and the highest-ranked American man, Mardy Fish, 33, is back for a last go — if for nothing else than to “reaffirm that I can still play the game.”
